page.title: 08Kirk of Lammermuir
page.content:
Cranshaws Parish now forms part of the United Kirk of Lammermuir along with Abbey St Bathans and Longformacus. The minister, the Reverend Alexander Slorach, lives in the manse in the village. His charge also includes the united parishes of Langton and Polwarth which lie to the South of Duns.
Services are held in the church at Cranshaws on the first and third Sundays of the month - a united service is also held when there is a fifth Sunday in the month.
A bible study group meets each Monday afternoon while a prayer meeting is held each Friday evening.
